rdf:Description.dc:title: The Later Life
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Louis Marie Anne Couperus (1863–1923)
Alexander Teixeira de Mattos (1865–1921)
rdf:Description.dc:rights: This eBook is for the use of anyone anywhere at no cost and with almost no restrictions whatsoever. You may copy it, give it away or re-use it under the terms of the Project Gutenberg License included with this eBook or online at www.gutenberg.org. This eBook is produced by the Online Distributed Proofreading Team at www.pgdp.net. Scans of this work can be found in the Internet Archive (1919 US Edition; 1915 US Edition: copy 1, 2, 3; 1915 UK Edition). This book is the second volume of the Books of Small Souls. The Dutch original is titled Het late leven, and was first published in 1902.
